description: Total HTML Converter converts HTML or MHT files to Doc, PDF, XLS, JPEG, TXT in bathes. FLASH is also supported. It can be handled via user interface or command line. There are lots of conversion options like Fit HTML Width To PDF-Page-Size option (useful when you print html-tables), or IE Footer & Header support.
summary: Convert HTML or MHT files to Doc, PDF, XLS, JPEG, TXT via GUI or command line.
author: CoolUtils
